These changes are set to take effect from 2026 onwards. According to the organisation, many of the updates are based on feedback […]

items.title: Switch 1/2 main event Black Friday deals: Super Mario Galaxy + Galaxy 2 all-time low, Donkey Kong Bananza, more
items.summary:
Best Buy just launched its main event Black Friday sale, Amazon’s starts very soon, and Woot is getting in on the action today with some great deals on Switch 1 and 2 games. More specifically you will find straight up cash markdowns Switch 2 titles like game of year nominee Donkey Kong Bananza and the Switch Edition Zelda titles, Just keep in mind, you are scoring 20% off all of them when purchased inside the Woot app ($40 maximum discount) and that means the brand new Super Mario Galaxy + Super Mario Galaxy 2 release is seeing one of its very first prices drop down to $55.20 Prime shipped – the discount won’t appear until the final screen during checkout. 

You’ll find some of the highlight Switch 2 titles in the list below – remember these prices are only live if you checkout via the Woot app – and you’ll find loads more Switch and PS5 games that will drop an additional 20% right here as well. 

  • Donkey Kong Bananza $55 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild – Switch 2 Edition $56 (Reg. $70)
  • Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom – Switch 2 Edition $63 (Reg. $80)
  • Mario Kart World $63 (Reg. $80)
  • Super Mario Party Jamboree – Switch 2 Edition + Jamboree TV $63 (Reg. $80)

Official 2025 Black Friday Switch 1 and 2 game deals now live – Nintendo titles up to 50% off

items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Black Friday Week sale event, TCL’s official Amazon storefront is offering its NXTPAPER 14 Android tablet for $299.99 shipped. This 14-inch model hit the scene about a year ago with a $470 price tag, and today’s deal delivers a straight-up $170 discount on it. It dropped to $370 ahead of the fall Prime Day sale in September, but today’s Black Friday offer beats that by a wide margin to deliver the lowest price we have tracked for it to date. Also, the bundle discounted today includes the tablet, a T-Pen stylus, and a flip case, making it a solid package if you’re after a reliable Android tablet for everyday use.
